content: The TDS end-semester exam is scheduled for September 2025.
You should use gpt-4o-mini instead of gpt-3.5-turbo for compatibility with ai-proxy.
GA2 is due by June 25, 2025. No late submissions are allowed.
Project 1 deadline is July 10, 2025. Submissions after this date will not be considered.
To install the required packages, run `pip install -r requirements.txt` in your terminal.
